channel.title: How to make your server not completely suck balls!
channel.description:
[u][b][size=12pt]Disclaimer[/size][/b][/u]
This is not a troll, and I had no intention of trolling whatsoever, I just think that people honestly need to see this.
[b]Purpose:[/b] To make your server not completely suck! [b]Difficulty:[/b] 0/10 [b]Tested On:[/b] All servers [b]Directed Toward:[/b] Idiots who can't run/program a server.
[u][b][size=12pt]Common sense[/size][/b][/u]
If you don't have common sense, your server will fail, simple as that. You can get common sense by:
[ul][li]Going to school regularly[/li] [li]Taking a break from the computer once and awhile and going out with friends.[/li] [li]Listening to people who obviously know what they are talking about[/li][/ul]
Just a few examples.
[u][b][size=12pt]Java[/size][/b][/u]
Complete this whole guide, then come back to rsps. It can be found [url=http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/datatypes.html]here[/url].
Read up kids.
[u][b][size=12pt]Listen[/size][/b][/u]
Blake, Graham, Yz85racer, super_, etc. Their word is law.
Most of those people have been in the RSPS Scene for a very long time and obviously know what they are talking about.
Most have the Java Guru status.
[u][b][size=12pt]inb4[/size][/b][/u]
inb4lock inb4igettutorialauthor inb4derail inb4postmoderation inb4scapejava inb4deathchaos9
[u][b][size=12pt]Conclusion[/size][/b][/u]
Now kids, I hope you learned something today. Any questions feel free to pm someone else about it and not me!

item.title: How to make your server not completely suck balls!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[size=12pt]Disclaimer[/size]

This is not a troll, and I had no intention of trolling whatsoever, I just think that people honestly need to see this.

Purpose: To make your server not completely suck!
Difficulty: 0/10
Tested On: All servers
Directed Toward: Idiots who can’t run/program a server.

[size=12pt]Common sense[/size]

If you don’t have common sense, your server will fail, simple as that.
You can get common sense by:

[ul][li]Going to school regularly[/li]
[li]Taking a break from the computer once and awhile and going out with friends.[/li]
[li]Listening to people who obviously know what they are talking about[/li][/ul]

Just a few examples.

[size=12pt]Java[/size]

Complete this whole guide, then come back to rsps.
It can be found here.

Read up kids.

[size=12pt]Listen[/size]

Blake, Graham, Yz85racer, super_, etc.
Their word is law.

Most of those people have been in the RSPS Scene for a very long time and obviously know what they are talking about.

Most have the Java Guru status.

[size=12pt]inb4[/size]

inb4lock
inb4igettutorialauthor
inb4derail
inb4postmoderation
inb4scapejava
inb4deathchaos9

[size=12pt]Conclusion[/size]

Now kids, I hope you learned something today.
Any questions feel free to pm someone else about it and not me!
